definition: see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to suffer (from illness)/to contract (a disease)/misfortune/trouble/danger/worry
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly

sentences.english: Opt for frequent cleanings to nip tarnish in the bud.
sentences.chinese: 只有经常的清洁才能防患于未然。

sentences.english: To sum up, prevention of the occurrence and development of diseases, prevention of the will.
sentences.chinese: 概而言之，就是预防疾病的发生和发展，防患于未然。

sentences.english: Prepare for the latent dangers before they materialize by seeking for preventive measures pro-actively.
sentences.chinese: 主动挖掘预防措施，努力做到防患于未然。

sentences.english: E. g. Regarding this shipment, we'd better stem the tide.
sentences.chinese: 关于这批运输货品，我们最好防患于未然。

sentences.english: The feature of TQM is "Management in advance, prevention before troubles occur".
sentences.chinese: TQM的特色反映在“事前管理，防患于未然”。

definition: to prevent troubles before the event (idiom)/to forestall/to nip sth in the bud
to nip in the bud (idiom)
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
Preparedness averts peril./to be prepared, just in case (idiom)
at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to think of danger in times of safety/to be vigilant in peacetime (idiom)
a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
surefire; absolutely safe (idiom)
unwary/negligent
as early as possible
to adopt measures/to take steps
emergency measure
to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case/prepared for any eventualities
safe/secure/safety/security
